casebody.data:
Savannah Electric Company v. Kaupf. No. 873. February 24, 1919. Osborne, Lawrence & Abrahams, for plaintiff in error. Oliver & Oliver, contra.

This case being for decision by a full bench of six Justices who are evenly divided in opinion, Hill, Gilbert, and George, JJ., favoring an affirmance, and Fish, O. J., Beck, P. J., and Atkinson, J., favoring a reversal, the judgment of the court below stands affirmed by operation of law.

Action for damages. Before Judge Meldrim. Chatham superior court. February 25, 1918.
